Title: Step 6: Interact with Guardian-RX to Start the Simulation
Text: The defense simulation will begin once I interact with Guardian-RX. My task is to protect it from waves of attacking robots that will spawn throughout the ruined fort and try to destroy it. I need to eliminate them before they reach Guardian-RX.
CompleteText: The defense simulation has started. Enemy robots are closing in from all directions. Itâ€™s time to protect Guardian-RX and survive the waves of attackers.
